title: Day of Reckoning Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to choose a player. For the next three days, if they whisper or send a message in a day chat, you will attack them.
- Use 2 bees to attack a player and their target, unless their target is the Harbinger.
- Use 3 bees to deal an Unstoppable attack to one player, a Powerful attack to another player, and a Basic attack to a third.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- When Empowered, you will attack a random non-Horseman player who visits your target whenever you use any of your abilities.
